Today in Northwest Wales, Porth Oer is lighting up with a solid 4 ft @ 6s NW swell and light 6 mph N wind, perfect for scoring some fun waves. Tomorrow, the swell drops slightly to 3 ft @ 6s with a bit more wind at 10 mph N, still workable at Porth Oer. By the day after, conditions ease further with a smaller 2 ft @ 5s swell and light 4 mph SSE wind, best around the morning tide. Best: today.
